title: Reinforcement Learning

definitions.Reinforcement Learning: A type of machine learning where an agent learns to make decisions by performing actions and receiving rewards or penalties.

formulas: Q-learning formula: Q(s, a) = Q(s, a) + alpha * (R + gamma * max(Q(s', a')) - Q(s, a))
summary: The slide introduces Reinforcement Learning, a machine learning approach where an agent learns optimal actions through rewards and penalties. It includes the Q-learning formula for updating the value of taking a certain action in a given state.
